description: Impose reduced RCP7.0 aerosol precursor emissions (not Nox).  Beginning in 2014 with air quality policies (or maximum feasible reductions) applied to the SSP3-70 aerosol precursor NTCF emissions.
name: RCP70ReducedAerosolPrecursorsNotNOx
longName: Reduced RCP7.0 Aerosol precursors but not NOx
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced aerosol precursors, not NOx
